thread.title: BRIEF-Fuel Tech Announces Exclusive Licensing Agreement For Dissolved Gas Technology For Water Treatment

title: BRIEF-Fuel Tech Announces Exclusive Licensing Agreement For Dissolved Gas Technology For Water Treatment

organizations.name: dissolved gas technology for water treatment reuters

text: March 2, 2018 / 1:54 PM / in 10 minutes BRIEF-Fuel Tech Announces Exclusive Licensing Agreement For Dissolved Gas Technology For Water Treatment Reuters Staff March 2 (Reuters) - Fuel Tech Inc: * FUEL TECH ANNOUNCES EXCLUSIVE LICENSING AGREEMENT FOR DISSOLVED GAS TECHNOLOGY FOR WATER TREATMENT * FUEL TECH INC - ‍ ENTERED LICENSE AGREEMENT WITH NANO2 LLC TO MARKET AND SELL NANO2’S DISSOLVED GAS TECHNOLOGY​ * FUEL TECH INC - DO NOT EXPECT AGREEMENT WILL HAVE A MATERIAL IMPACT ON RESULTS IN 2018 * FUEL TECH SAYS AGREEMENT PROVIDES EXCLUSIVE RIGHTS FOR CO TO MARKET DISSOLVED GAS TECHNOLOGY IN SPECIFIED END MARKETS THROUGHOUT NORTH AMERICA * FUEL TECH INC - ‍AGREEMENT TERM IS FOR LIFE OF UNDERLYING PATENTS & CO TO PROVIDE NANO2 WITH ROYALTY PAYMENTS FROM SALES Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
